The Great Outdoors.name: Jealous Devil Firestarters
The Great Outdoors.description: They look like tiny little bombs and work great!

In the Kitchen.name: Global Chef's Knife
In the Kitchen.description: An Anthony Bourdain favorite. Gets used every single day.

In the Kitchen.name: Picardie Tumblers
In the Kitchen.description: There are some utilitarian things I get pretty worked up about, and drinking glasses is one of them. These are about perfect, and also iconic.

In the Kitchen.name: Cookbook
In the Kitchen.description: A technique-focused cookbook by Anthony Bourdain illustrated by Ralph Steadman. Mic drop.

Other Necessities.name: Mr Bubble Bubble Bath
Other Necessities.description: I'm not telling you where to get the t-shirt because I don't want anyone else wearing it. But everyone should take bubble baths.
